title: I accidentally bought a develop Pixel 4XL without facial recognition hardware.
content: I bought a Pixel 4XL from internet, and I found that face recognition can't be used, After careful inspection, I found that there is no hardware for face recognition. But it's a true pixel 4 xl. I can't contact the seller now. Is there any policy for Google develop (factory) Pixel 4XL flow to market?
